titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to convey the National Defense Reserve Fleet vessel S.S. GUAM to American Trade Fair Ship, Inc.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 11/18/1999--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to convey the National Defense Reserve Fleet vessel S.S. GUAM to a certain not-for-profit corporation to use to exhibit products manufactured in the United States, during cruises around the world. Conditions such conveyance on the recipient having specified financial resources available to restore the vessel.
